title: France panorama. [No. 72/12]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Polynesia in Paris - discovering Polynesia. School of Architecture - the new Nanterre Faculty School of Architecture. River facilities - a new lock on the Seine. 2. The science of plant-life - the phytotron of Gif-sur-Yvette. 3. Artists’ workshops - studios, past and present. 4. Modern tapestries - an exhibition of today’s tapestry art.
